DESCRIPTION.P: Differentiate or difference, diff computes differences.
DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION_ITEM: for a vector X, is [X(2)-X(1) X(3)-X(2) ... X(n)-X(n-1)].
for a matrix X, is the matrix of column differences, [X(2:n,:) - X(1:n-1,:)].
DESCRIPTION.P: diff(X,n) is the n-th difference function.
